Source.Name: shotcut
Source.Summary: A free, open source, and cross-platform video editor
Source.Description: Shotcut is a free and open-source cross-platform video editing application for FreeBSD, Linux, macOS and Windows. It supports video, audio, and image formats via FFmpeg, and uses a timeline for non-linear video editing of multiple tracks that may be composed of various file formats. Scrubbing and transport control are assisted by OpenGL GPU-based processing and a number of video and audio filters are available.
